website_summaries.verdict: A most excellent motorcycle jacket for ladies. Sports the perfect combination of tough good looks, quality leather, and attractive fit.
pros: Has a crossover front that's adorned with pockets and zippers for a classic biker look
Cowhide leather is soft but durable, easy to clean, and resistant to moisture
cons: Jacket has a heavy feel, but this is also a testament to its quality
A few reports of a strange odor upon arrival

website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful women's motorcycle jacket that is expertly constructed from top-notch materials and boasts a timeless appeal.
pros: Includes a half-belt so you can wear the jacket comfortably at all times
High-grade leather craftsmanship ensures the jacket is constructed to last
Jacket's crossover front closes up to the neck and collar and lapels snap down to catch the breeze when you ride

customer_reviews.title: Awesome jacket, size up!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is exactly what I was looking for. It's very heavy duty. Thick material, good heft. If you're looking for a legit biker jacket for cooler weather with no frills yet useful pockets, look no further. Size: I am a 5'5" 135 lb athletic build. I generally wear size small up top. I went with a Medium and worried it would be a bit large- but it fits perfectly and snugly. Just enough room for warmer clothes under and the ability to bend arms. I'd even consider a large if I were planning to layer extensively or pack the pockets. I would NOT go smaller. Definitely size up, in arm length and fit!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Eberts

customer_reviews.title: This jacket is the REAL DEAL at a fantastic price.
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is the REAL DEAL at a fantastic price.. The leather is great quality, very thick, an authentic motorcycle jacket. I had to return it because the Medium was too big (I'm 5'0 125 lbs with a large chest so I sized up). Also, I was buying this jacket for style mostly and it was a little bit too thick for the warm Los Angeles weather and I figured I wouldn't get much use out of it. I was sad to let this beauty go but please please please do yourself a favor and purchase this gorgeous jacket.
customer_reviews.author: E. Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Omg my favorite jacket
customer_reviews.text: It fits as expected I wear a size 18 to a 20 so I got a 3x & it’s perfect the lining is easy to take out & put back on it’s a lil heavy but I expected that real leather has weight to it I luv it glad I brought it
customer_reviews.author: Yalonda

customer_reviews.title: old school rocks!
customer_reviews.text: nice jacket, i'm larger, wear a 18 and this fits nicely. this is a traditional old school biker jacket and fits as such. no gathering around the waist and the sleeves are long, which is great for me! nice zip out internal lining as well!
customer_reviews.author: s. joyce

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price and worth it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit tight but needs some break in time which does happen with leather coats. This is a heavy leather jacket. Smells like leather too and it’s super rock and roll. Got it in an extra small because I am 4 11 weighing 119 lbs. I wouldn’t get it in a small because it runs big. I’m sure with some time it will fit less tight but for now I’m very happy with my purchase. I am curvy and not at all skinny and I think anyone who is similar in height and weight should do an extra small.
customer_reviews.author: Rapunzle

customer_reviews.title: Quality and a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket!! Im 5'8" 140lbs 36c ordered a large and it fits perfect. Enough room to wear a sweatshirt underneath but not baggy without one. It sits just above my hips but i am tall and have a longer torso. Its a biker jacket so its not supposed to go past the hips. Durable material. Very very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this new jacket
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with this jacket- And the company was excellent with helping me when I had questions about my order. I am 5'4" 165 with a 38C/36D bust- I got a large and it fits perfectly. This is definitely not a "form fitting" leather jacket, definitely more of a "boyfriend" fit. But I love it. I've seen reviews that the leather is thin, but I feel like the leather is thick and sturdy, but still flexible-just enough for me to move around in. Love this jacket!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hoke

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket
customer_reviews.text: Leather is really substantial/ thick. Additional lining that zips out. Fits really snug and I sized up! After reading reviews. Not so small I’m returning (I hate the hassle) plus I can wear it just wish it wasn’t as snug. So, if you want to wear layers underneath be warned. Would give 5 stars if size guide fitting more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonladi

customer_reviews.title: Great quality of lezther
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket I got a size larger than I normally wear. I read reviews.glad I did.it fits well.love the look of jacket.has a zip in liner ,plenty of zip up pockets.arms zip up keeps wind out. has inside jacket pockets if you carry etc .nice quality.i got an XXL because of bust size.it fit perfect.im short armed so sleeves just a bit long.but I like that.great quality of leather!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive jacket, good quality, good price
customer_reviews.text: Update: the XL Jacket fits better, I’m ready for autumn & winter. I was pleasantly surprised by this jacket. I received this jacket today and loved it. The quality was great. It was a heavy jacket, loved the insert. Unfortunately I have to send it back tomorrow for a bigger size. I’m 5’6, weigh 160lb am a 36DDD... I ordered a large, returning it for a XL... it was tight under my arms, so it would be bothersome holding onto my hubby for hours...but honestly love this jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi J.

customer_reviews.title: Boxier cut. Shinier leather and the silver belt buckle was ver shiny also.
customer_reviews.text: True Milwaukee Leather quality. I have a distressed leather jacket from Milwaukee leather that I absolutely love but have grown out of. This jacket was kind of a shinier leather and I did not like the waist buckle. It was more of a masculine cut then I like. I returned because I didn’t like the cut of the jacket. I returned for different style.
customer_reviews.author: iamdgall

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Happy and Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with this Jacket!! It does fit slightly loose, however, that is a great thing in case I want to layer, which I always do! I also thought it would be much stiffer and restrict my movements, and have certainly found that NOT to be the case!!!! I would recommend this jacket to anyone!!! An extremely happy customer!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality for a very fair price.
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a REAL leather MOTORCYCLE jacket. THIS. IS. IT. It's quality is fantastic. I loved the fact that is had a removable zippered lining. Also this jacket is heavy- but thats because its a real motorcycle jacket. If you're looking for something that safe to wear on a motorcycle- this is your jacket.
customer_reviews.author: BlaCk_SpuNk

customer_reviews.title: Ramones Jacket
customer_reviews.text: This is the best leather jacket I’ve owned at an amazing price! There is double lining which is great, I was too hot in 30 degree weather! This is a cool weather jacket with the extra lining, I wore it when it was 6 degrees out with just a sweater underneath and felt just fine. A purse isn’t even necessary with all these big pockets. It looks cool, it’s warm, it fits well, it’s amazing. I’m 5’7 and 125lbs and the small fit well although I could have went down a size.
customer_reviews.author: BBRebBe

customer_reviews.title: ... the reviews and ordered a 2XL and it fit great!! Just order up a size or 2
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and ordered a 2XL and it fit great!! Just order up a size or 2, I went 2 sizes to wear with hoodies and such, they do run small. I love the coat. Very well made and heavy I can't say enough. The quality is of a much more expensive leather coat. YOU WILL NOT BE SORRY!!!
customer_reviews.author: diana fay

customer_reviews.title: Great leather
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Not too stiff or heavy. I'm 5'4, 130lbs, 36D chest... I ordered large because I already have a fitted leather and I was looking for something with a roomy "90's" fit. The large is perfect, very comfy but I'm not swimming in it. I imagine if I wanted a more true to size the medium would be perfect for my build.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you want a really good quality jacket for the price you are not going to beat this
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that I would like to be in a bit different about this jacket which probably could not be is that with the liner I wish it could be a little looser and not ask snug.but overall I absolutely love the jacket. It's a heavy jacket it's comfortable I really enjoy wearing it thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Warren

customer_reviews.title: I have pretty skinny arms yet they were tight
customer_reviews.text: Order this jacket 1 size up. The problem is in the arms. I have pretty skinny arms yet they were tight, especially with the liner in it. We returned the medium for a Large which is better, but still a bit tight with the liner in. Perfect without the liner.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna M. Willard

customer_reviews.title: and hated them for being too cheaply made or some other ...
customer_reviews.text: First off.. let me start by saying I’ve ordered several black leather Moto jackets from various places, and hated them for being too cheaply made or some other reason. So I found this one last night and based on feedback I figured I’d give it a try. I am beyond impressed and couldn’t be more happy. Not only is this jacket perfect but it’s soft and doesn’t need to be broken in. I’m a happy girl.
customer_reviews.author: dana olivieri

customer_reviews.title: quality leather
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this jacket I was afraid I would have to return it but it fits my girlfriend perfectly. I did order one size bigger than she normally wears to allow for additional clothing. The jacket is super nice, quality leather and beautiful workmanship
customer_reviews.author: Herb

customer_reviews.title: and it fits great even in the arms
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted a leather jacket for a long time; I just didn't think I would ever get one. Then I found this jacket....It was the right price, I ordered one a little larger thanks to previous reviews advising just that, and it fits great even in the arms. I received it on Friday after ordering it on Monday, so shipping was extremely fast. I love love love this jacket!!! I am so glad I found it. If you're thinking about getting this jacket, definitely get one size bigger though.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Browning

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the jacket. I had to return and I’m ordering a size larger. I am5’6” tall and weigh about 150. Size 14 so I usually order an XL. The CL would zip but it was snug so I returned for larger size. However the jacket itself was very very nice and loved all the pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Karen D. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Leather Jacket
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Large at first but with winter clothes and even if I took the zip out liner out was a bit too snug, contacted company and they exchanged with no issues, I did have to pay to ship it back (was a bit pricey) as its heavy but was worth it for the no hassle replacement! Super comfortable, lots of pockets and a great jacket over all...
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Ater

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality. Runs Small.
customer_reviews.text: You have to go up 2 sizes larger than you normally wear. My mom wears an XL T shirt and the XXXL jacket fit her perfectly. The quality is amazing too! She loves it and says it’s her favorite jacket in her wardrobe now.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Collins

customer_reviews.title: Fit Couldn't be Better
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket for my wife to coordinate with my Harley Skull#1 jacket. It's a very good match. Wife loves it and appreciates the "action back" feature that permits full arm motion without binding across the back while holding tight to Hubby. The overall "cut" is very good and the jacket fits nicely.
customer_reviews.author: D. C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket. The quality is amazing and the only thing I didnt find true to the advertisement is that the lining is not orange. Other than that minor detail(not really minor) I have enjoyed it and it is so warm. It will be the only one I ever have to buy I can guarantee that. Got it on sale as well. You wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Retro strawberry

customer_reviews.title: Classic lady biker coat
customer_reviews.text: Heavyweight leather motorcycle jacket sums it up! It is a classic look with an as expected fit. Has a removable liner. Zip sleeves. It's just the perfect lady biker coat. Much too heavyweight for a fashion statement. Love the look, smell and feel
customer_reviews.author: SheOkie88

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: The first time i ordered this, I got it in a size too large. I was going back and fourth about weather i wanted to return it or exchange it for a few days and after i had made the decision to return it, i changed my mind, gave the seller a call (who was super cool and was communicating with me all through the week prior) and she replaced it with the perfect size! I bought this over a year ago. this is my favorite jacket
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size up ×2
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter. She is a size Medium. I ended up having to return the first one I bought in her size because it fit like a small. I went 2 sizes up and got a perfect fit. This is a very well made jacket!!!
customer_reviews.author: christine kidd

customer_reviews.title: Thick real leather meant for the cold.
customer_reviews.text: It is a real leather jacket that is thick. It is not a jacket to be wearing in the summer since it is so thick. It is a jacket REALLY MEANT FOR RIDING A BIKE. Arms are tight. Not for the fashionista but for the actual rider.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Carpio

customer_reviews.title: Excellent jacket, especially at the price, or even double the price
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews before purchasing, and the (large) jacket fits my 5'9", athletic daughter well. I'm not sure of her weight, but she's neither petite nor plus size. The leather is excellent--thick, yet pliable. Well-sewn and finished. Scads of pockets and a removable liner. This is the jacket I couldn't afford when I was young enough to wear one. Perfect for Ramones fans--the classic motorcycle jacket cut that will never be out of style.
customer_reviews.author: Cicely Books

customer_reviews.title: Nice Inexpensive Leather Jacket
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice jacket. The leather is thick and heavy, and the zippers are industrial grade YKKs. I read reviews before I purchased, and I'm glad I did. I normally wear a 1X in plus sizes but this jacket tends to run a bit small in chest circumference, so I ordered two sizes up. I really look forward to wearing this nice leather jacket in winter!
customer_reviews.author: Lain Supe

customer_reviews.title: A perfect jacket
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket for my 15 year old daughter. It is very comfortable and it looks great on her. She totally loves it. Excellent price and quality. She especially loves the secret pocket on the inside of the jacket. The inside liner is securely attached but also easy to take off
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Cozad

customer_reviews.title: Love this jacket
customer_reviews.text: Awesome jacket! I'm 5' 4" tall and 240 lbs. I would normally wear a 2-3X But read in reviews to order a couple sizes up. Fits perfect with a little room to move in. Made very well. This will last a life time...if my dogs will allow it. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Lisa T

customer_reviews.title: Quality item
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received this as a Christmas gift. It is very nice, but a lot more bulky than she was expecting. It's a great jacket if you will be riding a motorcycle, but might want to look for something more sleek if you just want the look without the bulk.
customer_reviews.author: Hunniex2

customer_reviews.title: really nice jacket
customer_reviews.text: i love it - a little short in back for some reason but not horrible i can wear a light turtle neck under this or shirt but not a heavy sweater sleeves are tapered so close fit - some room - if i want a size up it wouldnt matter and might look too loose - overall I love it great price and quality for money
customer_reviews.author: Gardengal

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, heavy leather jacket!
customer_reviews.text: It is very heavy and should give a lot of protection. It’s snug, but I’m told the leather will stretch a bit. I took out the liner and it fits pretty good. It’s a lovely jacket. I did buy a size larger as was recommended by other.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Bjornskov

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic jacket, fantastic value
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this jacket. The leather is thick but much softer than I anticipated - for the price I was expecting it to be rather stiff. It looks like a far more expensive jacket. The hidden pockets are fabulous too; finally I can leave the house with no purse- all the essentials fit! I wear a 12 and got the xl so I could layer if necessary. The zip out liner is great too- makes this an item for three seasons!
customer_reviews.author: helen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Leather Jacket
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket based on the price. It was cheaper than in motorcycle stores and I was hoping that the quality was as good. I was pleasantly surprised! This is a quality jacket! It's heavy, as motorcycle jackets should be and it looks great on. I would definitely purchase this jacket again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She is a size 8 and I ordered the large and it was a perfect fit. She can wear a sweater underneath the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket for my wife who wanted a classic motorcycle jacket. She is a size 8 and I ordered the large and it was a perfect fit. She can wear a sweater underneath the jacket and that's what see wanted. The jacket was definitely of high quality and craftsmanship. She is very pleased! Also, the jacket came from California and the delivery time was quick.
customer_reviews.author: james a. brown

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Wish it was in brown also 😜
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is beautiful. The weight and the leather quality is excellent! If youre searching for a cool looking biker jacket that can be worn fashionably, this one's a WINNER!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Use the measurement chart !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to small for her the first time. All I can say is that the measurements chart is there for a reason. But once we properly measured and re ordered it fit like a glove. Leather feels great and the stitching is solid.
customer_reviews.author: James Sossamon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality motorcycle jacket.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket for my girlfriend. It got great. She's loved it. Is very good quality and thick leather. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy Viera

customer_reviews.title: but it's one of the warmest and most comfortable jackets I've ever owned and the zipper glides smoothly
customer_reviews.text: 5'8", 115lbs, ordered a medium, but should've ordered a small. It's quite bulky looking on me, but it's one of the warmest and most comfortable jackets I've ever owned and the zipper glides smoothly. If you don't mind the weight of it and you live in a colder area, I really recommend this jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Kelty

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! Amazing quality! It’s actually “too nice” ...it’s a real jacket! I was expecting light jacket to wear at the office. This is way way nicer. I still love it but it’s way too heavy to just wear at work. I am excited to wear this jacket!!!! It’s very stylish !
customer_reviews.author: Ktdearest

customer_reviews.title: this jacket is great, it's the perfect cut and weight for fall/winter ...
customer_reviews.text: this jacket is great, it's the perfect cut and weight for fall/winter riding. i love it and it's totally worth the price. only thing is, DEFINITELY order a size up. i'm between a 2x & 3x, so i ordered the 3, but it was still too small. forget your pride and order a size up!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Tokarski

customer_reviews.title: Zipps dont stay !
customer_reviews.text: The zippers on sleeves will NOT STAY zipped! So much for functioning properly while i ride my bike. The coat runs very small. I normally wear large and got xl and its still very snug on me! Coat is ok quality leather but you pay for what you get! Next time I purchase a leather it sure wouldnt be one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Am very happy i bought this
customer_reviews.text: Am very happy i bought this ...the first one i ordered i didnt receive but said delivered in front my home so i contacted seller and they rushed another to me which i received very fast and i am very happy with my purchase! I ware a large and ordered large it fits great! Looks nice! Great for riding! I recomend this jacket great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Michele

customer_reviews.title: Get ready for compliments
customer_reviews.text: Great quality jacket. I'm 5'2, muscular upper body build and this fits great. Sleeves are about 1-1.5 inches too long, but that was to be expected. When zipped up, it sits right above my hips and is plenty warm w/ the liner. I get compliments everywhere I go with this. Just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Rita M.

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant to order an XL, with my experience of ordering L jackets sometimes they don’t fit properly because I have bigger arms and a board back than average, mainly genetics but I’m very pleased with the fit and material. I just recommend that if you’re between sizes, size up.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Sciacchetano

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Runs small...I returned mine. It was EXTREMELY heavy and thick. I'm sure for a biker it's perfect. Definitely will keep you warm and keep the wind out.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Lemus

customer_reviews.title: Order it larger than what you wear...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this coat 2 sizes larger than i wear. Ie : i wear medium and x large fit perfect ... my chest is 36 DD ... im 5’5 and wear size 8 ... anything smaller wouldnt have worked....
customer_reviews.author: Nan C

customer_reviews.title: More than what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: The first real leather jacket I bought. I thought itd be a basic learher jacket like kinda thin, makes a lot of noise. Naaaaahhh. This jacket is very sturdy, fits exactly just as expected, thicc layers to protect you from road rash, looks cool, kinda hard to move around in but breaking it in should do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Undead sinister

customer_reviews.title: I love this jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket! The fit, design, and quality are great! I can see this jacket lasting for years. I originally bought this jacket in a larger size, based on the reviews, and it was way too big. I returned the jacket and the seller was amazing! They helped me thru the whole process!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Love love love my new jacket!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this jacket. I was very nervous when I ordered it that it would be poor quality but it’s exactly what I wanted. Great quality fits great very warm. Completely satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cuomo

customer_reviews.title: The jacket itself is good quality but you can't go by the size chart ...
customer_reviews.text: The jacket itself is good quality but you can't go by the size chart at ALL! I did and the XL is just way too small. But if I return it and get a larger size, the sleeves, which are already long, would hang to my knees. Be wary of the sizing.
customer_reviews.author: virginia livingston

customer_reviews.title: Yo girl if you need this jacket for some amazing street cred
customer_reviews.text: Yo girl if you need this jacket for some amazing street cred, grab a size either true or smaller. There is a lining you can zip off, I live in OC and we don't need all that. But I love love the jacket, I'm 5'8 and 150lbs and out of extreme hesitance I was able to wear a small comfortably.. and love it.. but I'm not riding thru the dark Swiss alps
customer_reviews.author: michelle denny

customer_reviews.title: Know your size
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great looking coat, unfortunately couldn’t get the size right, it was for my wife
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Runs a little small for a medium, but I am overall satisfied by the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jaz

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Quality leather and it first perfect. I did size up as the other reviews suggested to. I’m glad I did. I normally wear a large and grabbed an Xl, it’s a bit snug in the arms and bulkier than I anticipated...but looks kick ass on!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket. It has a liner for cold days (I live in AZ so those are few and far between) and I like the versatility of removing it. Fits as expected. Great item at a great price. 💯
customer_reviews.author: MilRod

customer_reviews.title: but the sleeves fit comfortably for me
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews about fit before i bought this. Sleeve tightness was a frequent complaint, but the sleeves fit comfortably for me. It's a sturdy jacket and I love it. I've waited a long time to have a jacket like this and am very happy I did not wait any longer.
customer_reviews.author: CateBTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, fits well
customer_reviews.text: I love that it fits comfortably but has a bit of wiggle room for an added layer if needed. The quality is great and the stitching was done with care. Also the inside lining running through the entire jacket instead of just the back piece makes it go from a once in awhile ok purchase to a great buy daily wear item.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Order a size larger
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the look. I usually wear a size 28 shirt...so typically a 5x. I ordered my normal size. Order a size larger. It is so small it will not fit. It gives me incentive to loose weight but I still recommend a size larger
customer_reviews.author: Melissa DeBoer

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting a leather jacket for years and I’m a big girl so it’s hard to find one this good with out paying a very high price. It’s a little tight around the waist and hips but I can still zip it up. The best is to know your measurements before you order, cause for some it can be a different size or the same
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer

customer_reviews.title: OH YAS
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket a couple months ago and it is TO DIE FOR. Fits true to size and I love love love all the pockets. Heavy and keeps you warm. Also this coat got delivered to me super quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Too tight as most international garmets. Almost did not get my money back. Got Amazon on them. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Nice heavy jacket
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy jacket, I thought about getting a medium but I'm nervous about it being tight after reading reviews so I'm sticking with Large for more room if I want to layer. I'm 5 foot tall , weight is 138 lbs if that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS JACKET. Well worth the "expense", its definitely cheaper than most if you look at real leather jackets similar.
customer_reviews.author: HJ Riley

customer_reviews.title: I love this jacket
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket... exactly as expected. It is HEAVY and well made. went up a larger size glad I did... its pretty snug.
customer_reviews.author: Keston

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS JACKET!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this jacket since the price was so low, but am so happy with it. Fits great, looks great. Excellent quality. Fast delivery and great communication from the seller. If you want to wear a sweater or sweatshirt under the jacket go up one size. If not it is a true fit! Can't rave about it enough!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty leather!  Normal sizing!
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy and well made leather jacket. The leather is thick, but not too stiff. It's just right. I was worried about fit, and was torn between a small and a medium. I didn't want the jacket to be boxy or too big or long in the sleeves, so I went with the small, and it's perfect!! I couldn't be happier! For reference, I'm 5'6" and 120lbs with 34dd cup.
customer_reviews.author: TxCpl

customer_reviews.title: it is thick and heavy - as a good leather jacket should be
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a gorgeous jacket. I never expected a jacket of this price to be so well made, it is thick and heavy - as a good leather jacket should be. However, it is slightly large and much too heavy for me, so sadly I must return it. I am looking for a much thinner and lighter jacket.
customer_reviews.author: B. Jane Spanos

customer_reviews.title: Very thick jacket worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Verry good biker jacket has lining that can be removed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: Great product.. very well made just did fit as expected...actually gave it to my mom who loves it
customer_reviews.author: Mary Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Warm Coat
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty and warm coat. I use it when we ride the Motorcycle and I stay very warm. This is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Walters

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality! Great features.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great quality jacket but it was a just a little bit small.
customer_reviews.author: Doubtnotreepicheep

customer_reviews.title: Great leather jacket!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her jacket! She is about 105 lbs, 5’4” and the extra small is a tight fit with a sweater underneath. I’d consider going up a size to fit thicker sweaters/hoodies. It kept her warm on the motorcycle at 65 degrees. WELL worth the money for a genuine leather jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Don G

customer_reviews.title: Nice Ladies Leather Riding jacket
customer_reviews.text: this is my wife's jacket,,,,,,waiting for some cold riding WX. otherwise, she likes it and seems to fit as measured.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: A FABULOUS jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this jacket!!! It's incredibly well made, heavy and very sharp looking. And, the price was amazing! I'd have to say, this is my favorite purchase all year.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket. I was looking for a classic leather jacket kit for riding and its just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: shelby ann

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket, super heavy and warm with liner in. Runs a little big. I'm 5'5", 130 lbs & size small fits like a medium. Also, it is a classic moto jacket, so it is rather boxy, not slim or tapered at all.
customer_reviews.author: sarah walker

customer_reviews.title: ... small suprised her for her birthday with a real good quality leather jacket and not Pleather
customer_reviews.text: I finally got it in small my girl petite I had got a medium last time it was semi too loose this time I got a small suprised her for her birthday with a real good quality leather jacket and not Pleather...thanks for changing the adress last minute I had stuff go missing so I changed it to where I knew I'd get it thanks alot again..I'll post pictures of her wearing it on her birthday April 28 thanks guys..
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket I love it but I had to remove the lining in order to be able to move my arms. It’s Way too tight I hope it loosens up with wear because everything else is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Christina Castellanos

customer_reviews.title: Quality of the jacket was great..
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the jacket was great...should have read the reviews thoroughly and ordered a size up. Waiting for my replacement to arrive.. My wife is patiently waiting for tomorrow!
customer_reviews.author: Winfield Leatherbury

customer_reviews.title: This jacket is gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is so much nicer than I anticipated. It has a removable lining. The jacket is warm. I got so many complements! Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gymratjo

customer_reviews.title: Best Kept Secret on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This moto jacket may be the best kept secret on Amazon!! I was really pleasantly surprised when I opened the package. I’ve searched high and low, tried to do the faux leather thing, but just couldn’t. This jacket has got great weight to it - a real moto jacket. And it had a nice lightly padded, zip out lining. Such a great value. LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Berndes

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift and she loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my tomboy granddaughter and she loved it! It fit her perfectly and was very well made.
customer_reviews.author: K.Kohl

customer_reviews.title: best leather moto
customer_reviews.text: This is heavy, not one of those wimpy fashion jackets for four times the cost. It feels great on. It is lined and quite warm. It fit perfect. It is exactly what I was looking for. It smells like leather. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Hashemi

customer_reviews.title: My favorite leather jacket, thus far.
customer_reviews.text: Roomy pockets, zip out liner, CC pockets, great leather smell.... What more could a girl ask for? Absolutely LOVE this jacket!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice jacket, durable and well insulated
customer_reviews.text: Very nice jacket, durable and well insulated. The only reason I returned it was because it was a little constricting on my arms while riding, but over all great jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: BadASS with out trying
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is so badass. You feel different and I can only imagine the more it wears it will be even BETTER!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the jacket, not cheap leather, but ran small made me sad
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is one nice looking jacket and I love it! It feels good on and when I get some boots, I’ll be set!
customer_reviews.author: Beenie62

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, good fit, & works with varying weather
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a leather motorcycle jacket and couldn't find one anywhere! I found this AND they got it here in time for xmas. Leather is good quality and the zip out lining means I can wear it no matter the crazy weather in Texas.
customer_reviews.author: Cate C.

customer_reviews.title: (Rachel) Wonderful jacket, keeps me very warm while riding on ...
customer_reviews.text: (Rachel) Wonderful jacket, keeps me very warm while riding on the back of my husband's motorcycle. You'll need a pair of gloves bc the wrists aren't fitted tight enough to keep out the cold air.
customer_reviews.author: Louis and Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Real Riders Wear Leather
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved this Christmas gift. The look and feel of this leather jacket is perfect. I have racked up good husband credit for the rest of 2016:-) I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Henry

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but runs small to size
customer_reviews.text: Well made and heavy leather, but order next size up than you normally wear in a jacket.
customer_reviews.author: 80omni

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’5” and 135lbs. I ordered a medium. It’s snug but I can still wear a cotton turtle neck and a cashmere cardigan sweater under it if necessary. If you want more room order a large. It’s also heavier than I expected. The quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda L. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: smells great
customer_reviews.text: First one was too tight,girlfriend hadn't taken into account her fabulous boobs reordered the correct size fits perfect ,well made and smells great,that new leather smell ,very happy,lot of bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: brian ashworth

product_meta.title: Ladies Leather Motorcycle Leather Jacket Plain Sides
product_meta.description: The LC 2701 is a beautiful women’s classic leather jacket . It has half belt and crossover snap down collar. It runs longer than usual and comes in regualr and plus sizes. A must have for fashion and great for riding on the motorcycle. Made with top grade leather.
feature_bullets: Ride like the wind or hitch a lift on his bike and be protected while looking good! This is a Biker Girls’ Leather Jacket.
Crossover Front closes up to neck when cold and collar and lapels snap down to catch the breeze or look cool.
Silver Hardware, 2 Outside Zip Pockets plus Coin Pocket, 1 Inside Pocket, and one Snap Closure pocket for additional storage
alf Belt, Zip Sleeves and Zip out Liner.
